card.name: Aamumeren Isä
card.text: Unique. Maia. Animals. Whales. 2 strikes. May be played keyed to any Coastal Sea region [c] in the Northern Waste. Make a roll (modified by -2 if the company is overt) before strikes are assigned: 8-12 attack is detainment, 5-7 attack proceeds normally, 4 or less attack proceeds normally, but if all strikes are successful the company must return to its site of origin. As a long-event, each company traveling in the Northern Waste with a Coastal Sea region in their site path must return to its site of origin.

card.name: Aerfaroth
card.text: Unique. Playable at Pieni Satama if the influence check is greater than 8. Standard Modifications: Men (+1), Elves with a home site in the Northern Waste (+1), Dwarves (-1). tap: cancel an attack keyed to East Bay of Forochel or West Bay of Forochel keyed by type or name.

card.name: Agog
card.text: Unique. Ice-orc. Leader. +1 prowess against Elves. +2 EI against Ice-orcs. +2 EI against the Ice-orcs and Orcs of the Bleak Mountains factions. +2 prowess/body when in the Northern Waste, +1 prowess when you have any manifestation of the The Witch-king in play.No More Nonsense may be duplicated on Agog.

card.name: Aiwendil
card.text: Unique. Manifestation of Radagast. Playable on a hero company moving in Wilderland or the Northern Waste, if you have not revealed an avatar. You may play Spells and ring tests with the company (no CC required). If you move through 2 Wilderness [ww], you may bring 1 resource from sideboard to your play deck.Discard if you have 10 P or more, if you play anon-hazard manifestation of an avatar, or if the company does not (attempt to) move.

attr.value: Pendrath na-Ûdun (0), Rusted-Deeps (11), The Vaults of Utumno (8), The Under-forges (7)
(1st) Spawn — 2 strikes with 11 prowess; (2nd) Opponent may play as an automatic-attack any 1 Drake hazard creature or any (non-spider) Spawnmanifestation.
A company attempting to leave this site must tap a sage or an avatar to be allowed a movement roll.
Pendrath na-Ûdun (0), Rusted-Deeps (11), The Vaults of Utumno (7), The Under-forges (6)
(1st) Spawn — 2 strikes with 11 prowess;(2nd) Opponent may play as an automatic-attack any 1 Drake hazard creature or any (non-spider) Spawn manifestation.
A company attempting to leave this site must tap a sage or an avatar to be allowed a movement roll.
(1st) Drake — 1 strike with 10 prowess (2nd)* Drake — 2 strikes with 11 prowess (see special)
*an additional item may be played at the site if the second automatic-attack is faced.
(1st) Drake — 1 strike with 10 prowess; (2nd)* Drake — 2 strikes with 11 prowess (see special)
*an additional item may be played at the site if the second automatic-attack is faced.

card.name: Anglachel
card.text: Unique. Weapon. Playable at Tol Morwen. Warrior only: +1 prowess to a maximum of 10. After every strike bearer faces he must make a CC. A stored Reforging may be placed with this item to ´´restore´´ it. Once restored Anglachel is worth 5 mp and gives +5 prowess (to a maximum of 12); -3 to targets body.

card.name: Angrist
card.text: Unique. Playable at Remains of Thangorodrim or The Pits of Angband. Weapon. +2 prowess. Armor or helmets cannot be used against a strike from the bearer of Angrist. A stored Reforging may be placed with Angrist to restore it. If restored: +4 prowess against Spawn. tap: take Sharp Blade from your discard pile into hand. Man or Dúnadan only: tap: at any time to prevent a Spawn permanent-event fom being discarded.

card.name: Anguirel
card.text: Unique. Weapon. Playable at any Under-deeps Ruins& Lairs [R] after facing an automatic-attack.Warrior only: +4 prowess and -3 to the body of strikes bearer faces. For every strike bearer faces he must make a CC (after the attack). This item gives 4 CP to a minion or overt bearer.

card.name: Banishment
card.text: Sage only. Playable on a Ruins & Lairs [R] with an Undead automatic-attack. Tap the sage. The site loses its Undead automatic- attack(s). Sage makes a CC modified by -3. Discard this card if the company plays an item at the site or if the site is discarded or returned to its location deck.

attr.value: (1st) Dark Enchantment (Spell of Cold) — each character faces a strikes with 12 prowess; instead or using prowess against the strike, each character uses his body modified by +3 if he taps; (2nd) Opponent may play as an automatic-attack a hazard creature from his hand normally keyed to Angmar.
A sage may discard a Stolen Knowledge card he controls to force the discard of any environment card in play.

(1st) Dark Enchantment (Spell of Cold) — each character faces a strikes with 12 prowess; instead or using prowess against the strike, each character uses his body modified by +3 if he taps; (2nd) Opponent may play as an automatic-attack a hazard creature from his hand normally keyed to Angmar.
A sage at this site may tap to bring an environment card from your discard pile to play deck (reshuffle); a Ringwraith at this site may tap to take an environment card from discard pile to hand.

card.name: Beadmaker's Healing Runeknife
card.text: Weapon. Playable only at a Ruins & Lairs [R] in the Northern Waste. Rune item. May not be included with a starting company. tap: give +1 prowess to the bearer against a strike. Sage only: discard this item to give +1 body to the bearer or another character in his company for the rest of the turn or ttap bearer and discard this item to heal another character in his company.

card.name: Beadmaker's Hunting Runeknife
card.text: Weapon. Playable only at a Ruins & Lairs [R] in the Northern Waste. Rune item. + 1 prowess (to a maximum of 9). Ranger only: tap: force opponent to search his discard pile for a non-unique Animal hazard creature. This creature immediately attacks bearer as though he was a 1 character company. tAAlternatively, tap: discard this item to modify the prowess, body and strikes from a non-unique Animal or Wolf attack by -1.

card.name: Berninga
card.text: Unique. Playable at Ligr Wodaize Berne if the influence check is greater than 9. Standard Modifications: Men (+1), Lossoth (-3), Angmarim (-3), any Orc faction (-2) tap: cancel a Bear attack keyed to regions in the Northern Waste against any of your companies, or cancel the effects of Beorning Skin-changers on a company moving in these regions.

card.name: Bone-harpoon
card.text: Weapon. May only be played at sites in the Northern Waste. Two-handed. Warrior only: +1 prowess (to a maximum of 6). -1 body to all Wolf or Animal strikes against the bearer.

card.name: Canadras
card.text: Unique. Cold-Dragon. May be played at Canadras. 2 strikes. +2 prowess against Dwarves. If Doors of Night is in play, may also be keyed to Lindalf, Narthalf, Rast Losnaeth and Thorenaer and to sites in these regions.

card.name: Canadras Ahunt
card.text: Unique. Any company moving in Lindalf, Narthalf, Rast Losnaeth and/or Thorenaer immediately faces a Cold-Dragon attack (considered a hazard creature attack) — 3 strikes at 13/6; +2 prowess against Dwarves. If Doors of Night is in play, this attack also affects: Dor Bendor, Talath Uichel.

card.name: Canadras at Home
card.text: Unique. Unless Canadras Ahunt is in play, Canadras has an additional automatic-attack: Cold-Dragon — 2 strikes at 16/7; +2 prowess against Dwarves. In addition, each creature attack keyed to a Wilderness [w] in the Northern Waste receives +1 prowess.

card.name: Canadras Roused
card.text: Unique. Manifestation of Canadras. Playable at Canadras if the influence check is greater than 12. Modifications: influencer discards a major item (+3) or a greater item (+6). All attacks by manifestations of Canadras against any of your companies are canceled. Any company moving in Lindalf, Narthalf, Rast Losnaeth and/or Thorenaer faces an attack: Cold-Dragon — 2 strikes at 15/7 prowess/body (+2 prowess against Dwarves).

card.name: Cardolanian Whalers
card.text: Men. May be played keyed to East Bay of Forochel, Everdalf, Forochel, Gondalf, Minheldolath, Rast Lornaeth, and West Bay of Forochel. Each character faces a strike with 11 prowess. Detainment against hero and covert companies: if 2 characters fail a strike, any subsequent strikes attack normally.

attr.value: men. may be played keyed to east bay of forochel, everdalf, forochel, gondalf, minheldolath, rast lornaeth, and west bay of forochel. each character faces a strike with 11 prowess. detainment against hero and covert companies: if 2 characters fail a strike, any subsequent strikes attack normally.
(1st) Traps — 2 strikes with 7 prowess —weapons do not modify, cannot be canceled— (2nd) Undead. Dwarf — 1 strike with 10 prowess (attacker chooses defending characters
a Dwarf at this site may tap to search the play deck or discard pile and take Map to Mithril into hand.
(1st) Traps — 2 strikes with 7 prowess —weapons do not modify, cannot be canceled—(2nd) Undead. Dwarf — 1 strike with 10 prowess (attacker chooses defending characters)

card.name: Conjure the Tempest
card.text: Sage only. Playable during the site phase at a non-Under- deeps Ruins & Lairs [R] )]. taTap sage and make a roll, add +2 or-3 (before the roll), if you discard (for no effect) a magic card from your hand. You may immediately play a faction normally playable at the site (even if tapped), from hand or discard pile, of the following type: 1-5 Demon or Undead, 6-10 Animal or Wolf, 11-12 Dragon or Drake. On an unmodified roll of 2 or 3 opponent may immediately play a creature of these types from his hand or discard pile; the creature must normally be keyable to the site or to generic site/region type, except [{]] (c)}]. Cannot be duplicated on a given turn.

card.name: Dakalmog
card.text: Unique. Ice-orc. Leader. Discard on a body check of 9. +2 EI against Orcs, +2 EI against Ice-orcs or Orcs with home site Kala Dulakurth.

card.name: Deathwind
card.text: Environment. Playable on a moving company in the Northern Waste, if Gates of Morning is not in play. All characters must make body checks for ever region symbol they move through. Failing a body check wounds the character, wounded characters become eliminated. The body checks are modified by -2 if character is an Elf or Dwarf, and/or if the character has a home site in the Northern Waste, and by +1 if character has a home site south of Eriador or Wilderland.

card.name: Demon-whale
card.text: Animal. Spawn. 1 strike. Attacker chooses defending characters. +2 prowess if company size exceeds 4. May be played keyed to any Coastal Sea [c] regions in the Northern Waste. If Doors of Night is in play, may also be played keyed to Dor Bendor or Elven Shores.

card.name: Durba
card.text: Unique. Ice-orc. Discard on a body check of 8. tap: heal a wolf ally under his control (from wounded to tapped).

card.name: Durlach
card.text: Unique. Balrog. Flying. Can use Sorcery. Discard all other manifestations of Durlach when this card comes into play. +2 to the roll for his company to move between adjacent Under-deeps sites. Durlach’s prowess is only modified by -1 when not tapping to face a strike. His prowess is modified by +1 when tapping to face a strike. He may not have any followers outside of the organization phase. He may not move to any other sites than Eithel Morgoth or The Under-forges.

card.name: Durlach, Bane of the North
card.text: Unique. Manifestation of Durlach. Balrog. Spawn. 2 strikes. May be played keyed to Eithel Morgoth and The Under-forges. If The Black Enemy’s Wrath is in play, may also be played keyed to all adjacent Under-deeps sites and to Narthalf. Cannot be affected or canceled by spells (except Sacrifice of Form) or magic cards.

attr.value: Any Gold Ring stored at this site is automatically tested (modify the roll by -2). If any of your companies is at this site, all attacks against it are canceled.
Any creature otherwise playable at any Under-deeps site may be played here. Non-Nazgûl creatures played at this site attack normally, not as detainment.
Any creature otherwise playable at any Under-deeps site may be played here.

card.name: Eloeklo, Demon of the North Wind
card.graphics: Eloeklo Demon of the North Wind.jpg
card.text: Unique. Spawn. Spirit of Ice and Cold. Manifestation of Eloeklo, Lindor’s Bane. Playable at any Ruins and Lairs[R] in the Northern Waste, if the company plays Conjure the Tempest with a result for Demon. Discard if the company moves south of the Northern Waste and Long Winter or Fell Winter is not in play. tap: cancel the effect of any environment for his company. If his controlling character is not an avatar, opponent makes a roll during your organization phase and subtracts 3: controlling character is eliminated if the result is greater than his mind.

card.name: Eloeklo, Lindor's Bane
card.text: Unique. Spawn. Spirit of Ice and Cold. 2 strikes. May be played keyed to Shadow-hold [S] or Dark-hold [D] against a moving company in the Northern Waste, if Doors of Night is in play. If Long Winter is in play, may also be played keyed to any non-Coastal Sea [c] region in the Northern Waste. If Fell Winter is in play, may also be played keyed to any non-Haven [H] site in the Northern Waste. Modify Eloeklo, Lindor’s Bane’s prowess and body by -1/-3 if the company uses Fire effects (e.g. The Fiery Blade, Wizard’s Fire, etc.) against the attack/strike.

card.name: Elves of Evermist
card.text: Unique. Playable at Evermist if the influence check is greater than 12. Standard Modifications: Elves (+1), Elves with home site in the Northern Waste (+3) tap: untap the Keeper of the Lodge Elf, if at Evermist.This card is worth an additional mp for each stored Tear of Yavanna.

attr.value: (1st) Elvish Wards — each character faces a strike with 9 prowess —weapons do not modify and cannot be canceled—(2nd) Elves — 3 strikes with 8 prowess (detainment against a covert company).

*Any gold ring may be played at this site. Anycompany moving to this site has its hazard limit increased by 2. A minion company may not attack another company at this site. A Ringwraith may not move to this site.

card.name: Fell-bear
card.text: Animal. Bear. 1 strike. Playable on a company moving in the Northern Waste with at least 3 Wilderness [w] in its site path. Also playable keyed to any non-Dragon’s lair Ruins & Lairs [R] in the Northern Waste. If the company contains Dwarves or Elves and Fell-bear’s attack/strike is canceled, you may play him again from your discard pile against the same company on the next turn, not counting against the hazard limit and regardless the site path.

card.name: Fellowship
card.text: Only playable at a Haven [H] during the organization phase on a company that has 4 or more characters and allies. +1 to prowess and +1 to CC for all characters and allies in the company. Discard this card if a character or ally joins or leaves the company for any reason.

card.name: Friend of the Kelvar
card.text: Place this card in your mp pile. You may place animal factions you have in play under this card. You gain the mp from this card when there are at least 4 animal factions under this card played at sites within 1 territory, (full mp if you are Radagast).Factions may not be duplicated under this card. Cannot be duplicated by a given player for a given territory.

card.name: Friends of Winter
card.text: Unique. This card is worth 3 mp when you have the Aerfaroth, Helechoth and Lossoth factions in play.

card.name: Galgrin's Hammer
card.text: Unique. Weapon. Playable at Canadras. Values in parenthesis apply to Umit bearer. +1 to bearer’s prowess. +2 EI against Umli and Men with a home site in the Northern Waste. tap: if bearer is a male sage, Dwarf or Umit to place a Reforging in the company with an item that can be restored (as if stored).

card.name: Galgrinic
card.text: Unique. + 1 prowess against Dragons and Drakes. +1 EI against Umit characters. + 2 EI against the Umli Traders faction.

card.name: Gates of Morning
card.text: Environment. When Gates of Morning is played, all environment hazard cards in play are immediately discarded, and all hazard environment effects are canceled. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Ghash!
card.text: Balrog specific. Playable on a company during the organization phase, if you have Master of Dread and Fear in play. You may bring this card from sideboard into your play deck (reshuffle) during your organization phase. For one of your companies all CC are modified by +2 while this card is in play. Discard if Master of Dread and Fear leaves play. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Gondring
card.text: Unique. Ice-Dragon. May be played at Gondring’s Lair. 2 strikes. Attacker chooses defending characters. If Doors of Night is in play, may also be keyed to East Bay of Forochel, Forochel, Rast Losnaeth and West Bay of Forochel andto sites in these regions.

card.name: Gondring Ahunt
card.text: Unique. Any company moving in East Bay of Forochel, Forochel, Rast Losnaeth, and/or West Bay of Forochel immediately faces an Ice-Dragon attack (considered a hazard creature attack) — 3 strikes at 12/7. If Doors of Night is in play, this attack also affects: Minheldolath, Númeriador.

card.name: Gondring at Home
card.text: Unique. Unless Gondring Ahunt is in play, Gondring’s Lair has an additional automatic-attack: Ice-Dragon — 2 strikes at 15/8. In addition, each company moving through a Northern Waste region has its hazard limit increased by 1 for each Coastal Sea [c] in its site path.

card.name: Gondring Roused
card.text: Unique. Manifestation of Gondring. Playable at Gondring’s Lair if the influence check is greater than 12. Modifications: influencer discards a major item (+4) or a greater item (+7). All attacks by manifestations of Gondring against any of your companies are canceled. Any company moving in East Bay of Forochel, Forochel, Rast Losnaeth and/or West Bay of Forochel faces anattack: Ice-Dragon — 2 strikes at 12/8 prowess/body (attacker chooses defending characters).

card.name: Great Seagull
card.text: Unique. Animal. Flying. Playable by a Dúnadan, Elf or Wizard at any tapped or untapped non-Haven [H], non-Dragon’s Lair site in a Coastal Sea [c] region (or adjacent region) in the Northern Waste. tap: cancel a strike directed against him. tap: force opponent to reveal all hazards from his hand; for either use, the next time Great Seagull would become untapped make him tapped instead.

card.name: Great Song of Awakening
card.text: Unique. Playable at Evermist on the Keeper of the Lodge Elf, if Land Reborn has been rotated 360°. Tap an Elf during the site phase atEvermist and make a roll (+1 for each other Elf tapping in support); if greater than 7 rotate this card 90°. For each time rotated this card is worth 1 mp and has the following effects (cumulative) for companies in the Northern Waste: One: Mordó and Morgoth’s Ring cannot be played (discard if in play). Two: all creatures keyable to Wilderness [w] or Shadow-land [s]need an extra Wilderness [w] or Shadow-land [s] in the site path to beplayed. Three: all CC from magic cards are modified by an extra -2.Four: if your opponent is Durlach, Hoarmûrath, Lomaw or The Witch-king you win the game.

card.name: Greater Spell-bead
card.text: Playable at any non-Dragon’s lair Ruins & Lairs [R] in the Northern Waste, if the company discards (for no effect) a Lost Knowledge card it controls. Rune item. +2 EI against characters with a lower mind than bearer. Warrior only: +1 to prowess and body (to a maximum of 10) when facing an Animal, Wolf or Awakened Plant attack. Scout only: tap: bring a scout skill card from your discard pile to your play deck. Diplomat only: tap: give +3 to an influence attempt against an animal, Ent or Man faction playable in the Northern Waste. Bearer makes a CC when this item becomes tapped

card.name: Grinding Ice
card.text: Environment. Playable on a company moving through Elven Shores or a Coastal Sea [c] region in Northern Waste. Change 1 Coastal Sea [c] in the company’s site path to a Wilderness [w]. May also be played as a hazard against a company moving through the above regions.

card.name: Guardian of the Fire-gates
card.text: Unique. Manifestation of Durlach. Spawn. Playable at the Under-forges. tap: discard a hazard permanent-event played on a company moving to an Under-deeps site or on a character in such a company. Discard this card if his company moves to a non-Under-deeps site, or to an Under-deeps site without Black Enemy’s Wrath in play. -2 to his prowess/body if not at the Under-forges or when Black Enemy’s Wrath is not in play. During your organization phase, opponent makes a roll and subtracts 2: if the result is greater than the controlling character’s mind, the character is eliminated.

card.name: Hammer of Morgoth
card.text: Unique. Balrog specific. Playable at any tapped or untapped non-Darkhaven [K] Under-deeps site. Weapon. One-handed. May only be borne by a Balrog. This item affects a Balrog. +1 prowess when tapping to face a strike. -1 to the body of any strike against the bearer. A Balrog may opt to face 2 strikes from one attack with no prowess penalty.

card.name: Haunted Place
card.text: Playable on a site with an Undead automatic-attack. That automatic-attack cannot be canceled this turn.

card.name: Helechoth
card.text: Unique. Playable at Hyvät Kalat if the influence check is greater than 7. Standard Modifications: Men (+1). tap: cancel an Animal, Wolf or Giant attack keyed to Lindalf or Thorenaer by type or name. This faction is worth 2 mp if the Wind-horde faction is not in play.

card.name: Helecthil, Light of the North
card.text: Environment. When Helecthil, Light of the North is played, all environment long-events in play are immediately discarded. Helecthil, Light of the North is not discarded when Doors of Night is played, but when either Skies of Fire, The Sun Shone Fiercely or Sun is played. The hazard limit for every hero and covert company in the Northern Waste is reduced by 1 (to a minimum of 2). Cancel all environment effects which cause a company in the Northern Waste to return to their site of origin. Cannot be duplicated.

attr.value: This site is considered a Haven [H] for the purposes of healing and playing hazards.
(1st) Elves — each character faces a strike with 9 prowess (detainment against a covert company);(2nd) Elves — 3 strikes with 8 prowess (detainment against a covert company).

An overt company must tap an untapped character (if available) if this site is revealed as its new site. Any company moving to this site has its hazard limit increased by 1. Snow-elves may always be played against an overt company at this site.

card.name: Hibernating Troll
card.text: Troll. 1 Strike. Only playable on-guard at a Ruins & Lairs [LR] in the Northern Waste. Before resolving the attack make a roll: if the result minus company size is greater than 5, the attack is canceled. If Hibernating Troll is defeated, the first item played does not tap the site: otherwise the site is tapped. Each warrior in the company lowers the prowess and body of Hibernating Troll by 1.

attr.value: troll. 1 strike. only playable on-guard at a ruins & lairs [lr] in the northern waste. before resolving the attack make a roll: if the result minus company size is greater than 5, the attack is canceled. if hibernating troll is defeated, the first item played does not tap the site: otherwise the site is tapped. each warrior in the company lowers the prowess and body of hibernating troll by 1.

card.name: Hithailin
card.text: Ritual. Playable on an Elf at Evermist bearing Vision Path. +1 to his CC for spells. Target Elf may store any Information or Lost Knowledge resource he controls during the site phase at Orod Certhas; place it with the site and you may take a spell from your discard pile or sideboard to hand. Orod Certhas is never discarded or returned to the location deck, This card may be stored at any Elf-hold outside the Northern Waste. If stored, any resource stored at Orod Certhas is worth 1 mp. You may store only 1 copy of this card.

attr.value: Lossoth faction is playable at this site.
If Gates of Morning is in play, this site is considered a Port.
Men --- each character faces a strike with 5 prowess (detainment against covert company)
If Gates of Morning is in play, this site is considered a Port.
If Gates of Morning is in play, this site is considered a Port.
Lossoth faction is playable at this site. If Gates of Morning is in play, this site is considered a Port.

card.name: Ice Giant
card.text: Giant. 1 strike. May be played keyed to Gondalf, Lindalf, Minheldolath, Narthalf, Rast Losnaeth, or Thorenaer. May also be played keyed to Ruins & Lairs [R]in these regions. If Doors of Night is in play, may also be played keyed to any non-Coastal Sea [c] region in the Northern Waste.

card.name: Ice-drake
card.text: Ice-drake. 2 strikes. May be played keyed to any region in the Northern Waste and Elven Shores.

card.name: Ice-drakes of the Ered Úmarth
card.text: Unique. Playable at Pendrath na-Udûn if the influence check is greater than 12.Modifications: discard a magic card from hand (+3), for each major or greater item in your hoard (+2). Each of opponent’s companies moving through Gondalf, Narthalf or Minheldolath must make a roll: if lower than 7 it faces an attack: Ice-drakes — 3 strikes at 15/5 prowess/body.

card.name: Ice-king of Urd
card.text: Place on Hoarmûrath the Ringwraith if in play as your Ringwraith; he becomes a War-lord. You may play this card in lieu of a minor item in your starting company and start the game at Lugdruong; Hoarmûrath gains this site as a home site. Discard this card to take Snow-hammer from your discard pile to hand.Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Ice-troll
card.text: Discard on a body check of result of 9. +1 prowess against Dwarves. -1/-2 to his prowess and body if not in the Northern Waste.

attr.value: Any non-"Dragon's lair" Ruins and Lairs in the Northern Waste

card.name: Into the Unknown
card.text: Playable during organization phase on a company moving without region cards.Company may move from a site of origin in 1 of the following regions to a new site in 1 of the following regions: East Bay of Forochel, Ekkaia, Elven Shores, Gondalf, Lindon, Thorenaer, or West Bay of Forochel. The site path is [ccc] and the hazard limit is decreased by 2 to a minimum of 2.

card.name: Iron Mountains
card.text: Playable at the end of the organization phase on a company containing a ranger. If the company moves with region movement, tapap a ranger to move as if the following pairs of regions were adjacent: Angmar and Everdalf, Angmar and Dragon Gap, Angmar and Talath Uichel, Gundabad and Talath Uichel, Gundabad and Everdalf. The company faces an attack at the beginning of its movement/hazard phase: Orcs — 2 strikes with 7 prowess. Alternatively, if the site moved to is in any of the regions listed above, the hazard limit is reduced by 2 (to a minimum of 2). Cannot be duplicated on a given company.

card.name: Jääkylät
card.text: If Doors of Night is in play this site is in West Bay of Forochel. Dwarf/Man/Umit characters may heal at this site. After successful play of a faction at this site you may play Bone harpoon, Beadmakers Healing Runeknife or Minor Spellbead from discard pile as minor item. Aerfaroth may be played at this site.

attr.value: Men — each character faces a strike with 6 prowess (detainment).

If Doors of Night is in play this site is in West Bay of Forochel. Dwarf, Man and Umit characters may heal at this site. After successful play of a faction at this site you may play Bone Harpoon, Beadmaker's Healing Runeknife or Minor Spellbead from discard pile as minor item. Aerfaroth may be played at this site.

card.name: Jääkylät
card.text: If Doors of Night is in play this site is in West Bay of Forochel. Dwarf/Man/Umit characters may heal at this site. After successful play of a faction at this site you may play Bone harpoon, Beadmakers Healing Runeknife or Minor Spellbead from discard pile as minor item. Aerfaroth may be played at this site.

attr.value: Men — each character faces a strike with 7 prowess (detainment against covert companies).

If Doors of Night is in play this site is in West Bay of Forochel. Burning Rick, Cot and Tree, Long Grevious Siege or Tempest of Fire may not be played on this site. Non-overt characters with a home site in the Northern Waste may heal at this site. *Tap such a character to place this site with him (it is not discarded or returned to the location deck). Discard this card from the company to cancel any attack keyed to a Coastal Sea [c] region by name or type.

card.name: Jäänainen
card.text: Unique. Spawn. Spirit of Ice and Cold. 1 strike. Attacker chooses defending characters. May be played keyed to any region in the Northern Waste. If Snowstorm or Long Winter is in play may also be played keyed to Border-holds [B] or Ruins & Lairs [R] in these regions. May only be played against a company containing a male non-Elf character. Male characters wounded by Jäänainen must make a CC modified by -2 during their untap phase until they are healed. As a long-event, all male non-Elf characters moving in the Northern Waste must make a CC at the end of their movement/hazard phase.

card.name: Karhunkäsi
card.text: Unique. +2 prowess against Wolves and Bears. -1 to all of his CC.-1 to influence checks against factions.

card.name: Keeper of the Lodge
card.text: Playable on an Elf at Evermist with a mind greater than 6. Tap character if untapped. Target Elf costs 3 pointsof influence to control, but cannot be controlled by EI. +1 to his CC. All attempts to place character back in your hand are canceled. ta Bearer may tap during your end-of-turn phase at Evermist to bing a ritual from discard pile to your play deck. Discard this card if bearer is at a site more than 3 regions away from Evermist or outside the Northern Waste, or if in company with an Elf with a higher mind. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Kénwe Foryaren
card.text: Unique. Noldo. May use any bow regardless of the card’s text. When Kénwe Foryaren is brought into play, you may immediately search your play deck or discard pile for a minor item or short-event with a healing effect. Discard if his company ever moves outside of the Northern Waste or Eriador, or if a Wizard is in his company outside of the organization phase.

attr.value: Evermist, any Border-hold in the Norther Waste

card.name: Kirrauko
card.text: Unique. Playable at any site after the company has faced a Spawn or a Nazgûl automatic- attack. Weapon. Axe. Two-handed. Cancels all dark enchantments targeting bearer. Warrior only: +3 to prowess (to a maximum of 10; +4 to prowess to a maximum of 11 and -2 to strike’s body against Spawn). tap: when facing a strike to untap bearer (during any player’s turn).

card.name: Konihrabn
card.text: Unique. Agent. +2 EI against Man factions playable in the Northern Waste or Angmar.Agent only: tap: make any non-unique Orc creature playable on a company leaving his current Border-hold [B] or Ruins & Lairs [R] in the Northern Waste.

card.name: Kragbogk the Berserker
card.text: Unique. Discard on a body check result of 5. Kragbogk’s prowess is only modified by -1 when wounded.

attr.value: Orcs — 3 strikes with 8 prowess (detainment against an overt company).
Ice-orcs faction is playable at this site. Non-Nazgûl creatures played at this site attack normally, not as detainment.
(1st) Orcs — 3 strikes with 8 prowess; (2nd) Wolves — 2 strikes with 7 prowess
Information, Items (minor, major, greater*) *— Palantíri only—
Information, Items (minor, major, greater*) *— Palantíri only—

card.name: Land Reborn
card.text: Unique. You may bring this card into play from sideboard, if you have a company at the same site in the Northern Waste as a manifestation of Radagast and you discard (for no effect) a Lost Knowledge card. For each stored Tear of Yavanna in play, rotate this card 90°; for every time rotated it is worth 2 mp and the following effects apply (cumulative): One: +1 to your hand size. Neither so Ancient nor so Potent cannot target a stored Tear of Yavanna. Two: Spirits of Ice and Cold attacks receive -2 strikes and -4 prowess (to a minumum of 1). Make a roll for each Deathwind, Snowstorm, Fell Winter or Long Winter; if result is greater than 6 it is discarded. Three: each overt character in the Northern Waste receives -1 prowess and their controlling player -1 hand size.Four: all non-Coastal Sea [c] regions in the Northern Waste become aWilderness [w].

card.name: Lassaraukar
card.text: Demon. 2 strikes. Attacker chooses defending characters. May also be played keyed to Lotan; and may also be played keyed to Ruins & Lairs [R] and Shadow-holds [S] in these regions. All subsequent attacks by Lassaraukar against this company this turn receive +2 prowess.

card.name: Legacy of Carcaroth
card.text: Each player may discard 1 Wolf hazard creature from hand during end-of-turn phase to take 1 Wolf hazard creature from his discard pile into hand. Discard when any play deck is exhausted. Cannot be duplicated.

attr.value: Men — each character faces a strike with 6 prowess (detainment against covert company).
Lossoth faction is playable at this site.

card.name: Lieutenant of Morgoth
card.text: Balrog specific. Playable during the organization phase on your Balrog, if he controls a Demon fána. If Flame of Udûn is played on your Balrog, he can use sorcery; if Master of Dread and Fear, he can use spirit-magic, and if Strangling Coils, he can use shadow-magic. Discard this card if you have no Demon fána card in play on your Balrog at the end of your organization phase.

attr.value: This site is considered a Free-hold [F] if Gates of Morning is in play.
This site is considered a Free-hold [F] if Gates of Morning is in play.

card.name: Link of Angainor
card.text: Unique. Playable at any Under-deeps Dark-hold [D]. All creature attacks without an asterix (*) against bearer’s company are modified by -1 prowess and -1 body. tap: give an additional -1 to prowess and body and -1 strike (to a minimum of 1) to such an attack. This item may not be played by a minion company.

attr.value: Opponent may play as an automatic-attack 1 non- unique hazard creature from his hand normally keyed to any region in the Northern Waste.
If Eloeklo is in the company, opponent may immediately search his play deck or discard pile for True Spirits of the North Wind, which is then played as an additional automatic-attack.

card.name: Lord Gothmog
card.text: Unique. Return any unique spawn manifestation to your hand from your discard pile and increase the hazard limit by 2. Alternatively, if Doors of Night is in play, one spawn hazard creature may be played at any Under-deeps site or surface site thereof. Cannot be duplicated in a given turn.

card.name: Los'pindel
card.text: Unique. Nando. +2 EI against Elves and Men with a home site in the Northern Waste, and Elf and Man factions playable at sites in the Northern Waste. +2 prowess and +1 body when moving through or at a site in the Northern Waste. When Los’pindel is at Helloth, you may keep 1 more card than normal in hand. Los’pindel makes a CC every organization phase if not in the Northern Waste. -2 mp if eliminated.

card.name: Lossadan Hunters
card.text: Men. 4 strikes (detainment and -2 prowess against covert and hero companies). May be played keyed to East Bay of Forochel, Everdalf, Forochel,Lindalf, Minheldolath, Rast Losnaeth, or West Bay of Forochel. May also be played keyed to Border-holds [B] and non-Dragon’s lair Ruins & Lairs [R] in these regions. Lossadan Hunters receive +2 prowess and +1 strike if played keyed to a Border-hold [B] against an overt company.

card.name: Lossidil
card.text: Unique. Playable at Helloth if the influence check is greater than 10. Standard Modifications: Elves (+1), Elves with home site in the Northern Waste (+3), Elves with home site Thranduil’s Halls (-2), Dwarves (-1), Men (-1).

card.name: Major Spell-bead
card.text: Playable at any non-Dragon’s lair Ruins & Lairs [R] in the Northern Waste. Rune item. Bearer is not affected by environment hazard short-events. Ranger only: tap: cancel a non-automatic- attack by Orc, Trolls, Dwarves, Giants or Men, not keyed to a site. card.name: Marin
card.text: Unique. +1 prowess when in the Northern Waste.

card.name: Master of Dread and Fear
card.text: Balrog specific. Demon fána. Playable during your organization phase on your Balrog avatar. Return this card to your hand: when you play another Demon fána card, or, if you choose, during your organization phase. Balrog may not move. +5 to your GI. Balrog gains the diplomat and sage skill and may have followers. You may keep 1 more card than normal in hand. Tap your avatar to force a character at the same site or in the same region as him (your choice) to make a CC modified by -1. Once during each of your organization phases, discard a card from hand to look at up to 3 random cards at once from your opponent’s hand.

card.name: Minor Spell-bead
card.text: Playable only at any non-Dragon’s Lair Ruins & Lairs [R] in the Northern Waste. Rune item. +1 EI against characters with a lower mind than bearer. Sage only: when bearer is required to tap for the use of a skill card, tap this item instead. Bearer makes a CC when this item becomes tapped. You may only start the game with this item if it is played on a character with a home site in the Northern Waste.

card.name: Mordó
card.text: Unique. Environment. Every creature attack without an asterix (*) keyed to a region or site in the Northern Waste receives +1 prowess. The hazard limit is increased by 1 for every hero or covert company in the Northern Waste. Every hero character moving through triple Wilderness [www] or Shadow-land [s] in the Northern Waste must make a CC at the end of the movement/hazard phase (only1 CC per turn per character). All hero factions playable at sites in the Northern Waste are worth one less mp (to a minimum of 1).

card.name: Morgoth's Ring
card.text: Unique. Playable only if Doors of Night is in play. Counts as 3 against the hazard limit. Any player may place hazard long-events they play under this card (for a total of 2 against the hazard limit). Hazard long-events under this card are not discarded as normal during the long-event phase. At any time, any player may discard 2 hazards from their hand to cancel any effect that would cause the discard of Morgoth’s Ring or of any card placed under it. Discard this card when any play deck is exhausted (this effect cannot be cancelled). When this card is discarded, all hazard long-events under it are discarded as well.

card.name: Morvran

card.text: Unique. Ice-orc. Discard on a body check of 8.

card.name: Nestador
card.text: Unique. Noldo. +2 EI against Elves. When Nestador is at Evermist you may keep 1 more card than normal in your hand. Healing cards and effects affect all characters in his company. -3 mp if eliminated.

card.name: Ningarach
card.text: Unique. Marsh-Drake. Male. 2 strikes. Play-able keyed to Amon Anlug. If Doors of Night, Gates of Morning or Grinding Ice is in play, may also be played keyed to Everdalf, Lindalf or Thorenaer, or at non-Haven [H] sites in these regions. + 2 prowess if keyed to Amon Anlug or a Swamp.

card.name: Northern Wyrms
card.text: Unique. Dragon-lord specific. When he is at Shapal Udûn, you may keep 1 more card than normal in your hand. May only be brought into play at his home site; if in your starting company, you must start the game at his home site.

card.name: Orcs of the Bleak Mountains
card.text: Unique. Playable at Mornost if the influence check is greater than 10. Standard Modifications: Ice-orcs (+2), Orcs of Angmar (-2). Spirits of Ice and Cold — 2 strikes with 7 prowess —resources which affect Undead also affect these Spirits—

card.name: Peaceful Coexistence
card.text: Playable on Radagast or a character with home site Beorn’s Houseor Woodmen-town; if not in play, such character may now be brought into play under Radagast’s EI at their home site. Bearer may tap to cancel all attacks from a Wolf or Animal hazard creature with 1 strike for each of its attacks. card.name: Pitää Kalasta
card.text: Unique. +1 prowess against Animals and Wolves. +1 prowess when in the Northern Waste. tap: cancel a Trap-attack. Any flattery or offering attempt against (characters in) his company is canceled and Foolish Words does not affect him.

card.name: Press on towards Shelter
card.text: Any moving company may include 1 extra region in its site path, if its destination is a Haven [H]. If Gates of Morning or Helectil, Light of the North is in play, this also applies to companies whose destination is a Free-hold [F] in a Free-domain [f].

attr.value: Umli Traders faction is playable atthis site.
Umli Traders faction is playable at this site.

card.name: Pursuit through Barren Lands
card.text: Playable on a leader with a home site in the Northern Waste or on Celedhring. You may start the game with this card in lieu of a minor item. Rotate this card 90° when the company is in the Northern Waste and you either: - successfully play Ice-drakes of the Ered Úmarth, an Information resource, or a manifestation of Eloekklo, Lindor’s Bane;- engage in CvCC with a company containing an Elf;- defeat an Elf hazard creature. If rotated 360°, invert this card when you play a Gold Ring item at Evermist. Only one copy of this card may be inverted. If inverted this card may be stored during the site phase at a Darkhaven [K] for 5 mp: all attacks by Elves are modified by -1 to strikes and prowess.

card.name: Raudabern
card.text: Unique. +1 prowess against Orcs. +2 EI against Umit and against characters and factions playable at Ligr Wodaize Berne. Raudabern suffers no prowess penalty when tapped or wounded.

card.name: Rays of Helecthil
card.text: Environment. Playable on a company in the Northern Waste, if Doors of Night is in play. Remove a corruption card on a character in the company or remove an environment card that affects the company’s movement or site path. Alternatively, untap all Elves and tap all other characters with a mind stat in the company. This card may also be played as a hazard: untap all Elves and characters with a home site in the Northern Waste, tap all other characters and allies with a mind stat. Cannot be duplicated on a given turn.

card.name: Reforging
card.text: Sage only during the site phase at an untapped site where Information is playable. tT Tap sage and site. Sage may not untap until Reforging is stored at a Haven [H]. During your organization phase, you may tap a sage at a Haven and discard a stored Reforging to retrieve any battle-gear minor or major ittem from your discard pile. The item must be placed under the control of a character in the sage’s company.

card.name: Ring of Detection
card.text: Unique. Ring. Playable at any Ruins & Lairs [R] in the Northern Waste. tap: if bearer is a sage or Elf to reveal an on-guard card played on his company. If the card could never be legally revealed at the site as an on-guard, discard the card. Bearer makes a CC modified by - 1.

card.name: Ring of Healing
card.text: Unique. Ring. Playable only on Nestador at a site in the Northern Waste. tap: during your organization phase, if bearer is an Elf sage with mind greater than 5, to heal a wounded character in his company and make a roll: if the result is greater than 9, character may heal from wounded to untapped, otherwise he heals but is tapped. Bearer makes a CC modified by - 1.

card.name: Ring of the Protector
card.text: Unique. Ring. Playable at Malgolodh’s Cave. Also playable as minor item after a successful influence attempt against a Man faction in the Northern Waste. A non-overt bearer may opt to have a strike he faces (except from this item) be ineffectual, but bearer must immediately face a strike (cannot be canceled, type is bearer’s race) with prowess equal to the original strike -3: if strike is successful, bearer is taken prisoner at his current site or the site moving to (rescue attack: 1@x where x equals bearer’s prowess +7).

card.name: Róin
card.text: Unique. +1 prowess when in the Northern Waste.tap: take Profitable Trade from your discard pile into hand.

attr.value: Men — each character faces a strike with 5 prowess (detainment against covert company).
Lossoth faction is playable at this site.

Only non-unique orc and troll characters may be brought into play at this site, unless the character has Shapal Udûn as its home site. Any gold ring stored at this site is automatically tested (modify the roll by -2). If 1 of your companies is at this site, all attacks against it are canceled.
Creatures played at this site attack normally, not as detainment.

card.name: Skis and Fur-coats
card.text: Playable during the organization phase on a non-Troll ranger at any tapped or untapped Border-hold [B] in a Wilderness [w] region. taTap the ranger. If Fell-winter, Long-winter or Snowstorm is in play or played on the company, the effects are canceled for this company and each character must make a body check for each Wilderness in its site path. This roll is modified by -1 if the character is a ranger and/or has a home site in the Northern Waste, and by +1 if a Hobbit. On a roll greater than 9, the character is eliminated. Otherwise, a failed body-check only wounds the character. Discard this card if the company moves to a site not in the Northern Waste or its adjacent regions.

card.name: Snow in the Mountains
card.text: Enviroment. Playable on a company moving through Forochel, Angmar, Gundabad, High Pass, or Withered Heath. If Doors of Night is in play, may also be played on a company moving through Númeriador, Redhorn Gate, Grey Mountain Narrow, or Iron Hills. Each character in the company makes a roll, adding his base prowess. If for any character the result is less than 9, the company must immediately return to its site of origin.

card.name: Snow Troll
card.text: Troll. 2 strikes. May be played keyed to any non-Coastal Sea [c] region in the Northern Waste, and to Ruins & Lairs [R] in these regions. Attacker chooses defending characters, if defending company does not contain a ranger. If Fell Winter or Long Winter is in play, it may be played keyed to all regions in the Northern Waste and all adjacent regions.

card.name: Snow Trolls
card.text: Unique. Playable at any non-Dragon’s lair Ruins & Lairs [R] or Shadow-hold [S] in the Northern Waste if the influence check is greater than 8. Standard Modifications: Stone Trolls (+2), Ice-orcs (-2), Wargs of Forochel (-2). tap: cancel a Troll attack against any of your companies keyed to a region or a Ruins & Lairs [R] in the Northern Waste.

card.name: Snow-blindness
card.text: Disease. Playable on a character moving in the Northern Waste. Make a roll for the character modified by +1 for every Wilderness [w] in the Northern Waste in his site path, and by +2 if the character’s home site is outside of the Northern Waste. If the result is higher than target character’s body, place this card on him; otherwise discard this card. Character receives -2 prowess and losses scout and/or ranger skills while bearing this card. taTap a ranger in his company and discard (for nor effect) a card with a healing effect to discard this card.

card.name: Snow-elves
card.text: Elves. 4 strikes. Detainment and -2 prowess against hero companies. Playable keyed to Dor Bendor, Everdalf, Lindalf, Talath Oiohelka or Talath Uichel and to non-Haven [H] sites in these regions. If Helecthil, Light of the North is in play, may be keyed to any region in the Northern Waste. If all characters in the company face a strike and if all are successful, the company must immediately return to their site of origin.

card.name: Snow-hammer
card.text: Unique. Playable on Hoarmûrath at any non-Free-hold [F] site in the Northern Waste (does not tap the site). Cannot be transferred. This item affects Hoarmûrath; he gains the warrior skill and is not taken to hand on a body check of 7 or 8. tap: Bitter Cold may be shuffled back into play deck instead of discarding it.

card.name: Snow-lion
card.text: Animal. 1 strike. Attacker chooses defending characters. May only be played against a company with 3 characters or less. May be played keyed to any Wilderness [w] region in the Northern Waste, or region adjacent to these if Fell Winter or Long Winter is in play. +2 prowess if the company has only 1 character or any Hobbits.

card.name: Song of Appeasement
card.text: Playable on a Spirit-namer after his company has faced an Animal, Wolf, Spider, Awakened Plant, Maia orSpirit attack. The Spirit-namer may tap to discard a hazard permanent or long-event in play, or make a roll with 1 dice (add the number of other Spirit-namers in the company); the hazard limit for his company is lowered by half the result (round down). On an unmodified roll of 1 or 2 opponent may immediately play Spirit Crime or The Balance of Things on the company from discard pile or sideboard. Spirit-namer makes a CC.

card.name: Spirit Crime
card.text: Corruption. Playable on a company that bears a non-minor item played at a non-Dragon’s lair Ruins & Lairs [R] inthe Northern Waste, unless opponent has Friends of Winter in play. All non-overt, non-Dwarf characters in the company have their rolls for offering attempts, influence attempts and riddling rolls, and all CC for transferring items between characters, modified by -2. During organization phase, taptTap a sage in the company and make a roll modified by +1 for every sage in the company: discard this card if the result is greater than 8. Cannot be duplicated on a given company.

card.name: Spirit-abuse
card.text: Spirit-magic. Playable on a spirit-magic user, or on aMan or sage character with a home site in the Northern Waste. Unless he is a Ringwraith, he makes a corruption check at -3. Character may use hero rune items as if they were minion items. tIf bearing a rune item, one defeated non-unique Animal or Wolf creature may be placed with this card. Before CvCC at a site in the Northern Waste, opponent’s company must face this creature (return it to the appropriate mp pile afterwards, or if this card is discarded). Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: Spirit-namer
card.text: Playable on a sage with a home site in the Northern Waste, if bearing a rune item. Character becomes a spirit-namer and may tap to discard a disease card played on (a character in) the company. tap: while at a Border-hold [B] in the Northern Waste to take Song of Appeasement from your discard pile into hand.Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: Sprautabern
card.text: Unique. Agent. +1 prowess against Orcs and Wolves. Skin-changer may be played on Sprautabern (as if on Beorn). Agent only: may move 2 regions per agent action if moving in the Northern Waste. May tap during movement/hazard phase to attack a company moving to his current Ruins & Lairs [R] or Shadow-hold [S] or to his home site.

card.name: Striuk'ir
card.text: Unique. Nando. +1 prowess against Orcs and Wolves. +2 EI against Elf and animal factions.

attr.value: Any site in a Wilderness in the Northern Waste

card.name: Tear of Yavanna
card.text: Playable at any Ruins & Lairs [R] in the Northern Waste on a character with a tapped Vision Path, if Land Reborn is in play.taTap the character, discard Vision Path, and make a roll: add 1 for each Elf and sage in the company and for each Tear of Yavanna in play. If result is greater than 9, this card is successfully played (otherwise take card back to hand). Character may not untap while bearing this card, but may heal (wounded to tapped) during untap phase. +1 to his body. This card may only be stored during site phase at Evermist. tap: cancel an Awakened Plant attack against bearer’s company. You may include up to 4 copies of this card in deck and sideboard combined.

attr.value: Hollow on the left Breast may be played at this site, regardless of the character's race.
Shoot in the Eye may be played at this site, regardless of the character's race.

card.name: The Angulion
card.text: Unique. Can use sorcery and shadow-magic.tap: during organization phase to return a magic card from discard pile to hand, if you discard a magic card from your hand and wound another character in his company.

card.name: The Crist-i-Sûlhoth
card.text: Unique. Weapon. Playable at any Ruins and Lairs [R] in the Northern Waste, if The Wind-horde or a manifestation of Eloekklo is in play (or has been played). Rune item. Warrior only: +1 to prowess (to a maximum of 9; against a Demon or Spawn strike: +3 to prowess to a maximum of 12, +2 to body to a maximum of 10, and -2 to strike’s body). Sage only: tap: search your play deck for True Spirits of the North Wind when bearer’s company faces a manifestation of Eloekklo.

attr.value: (1st) Drakes — 3 strikes with 11 prowess; (2nd) Opponent may play as an automatic-attack any 1 Drake or Dragon hazard creature from his hand.
Any Spawn or Drake ally playable at anyUnder-deeps site is also playable at this site. Non- Nazgûl creatures played at this site attack normally, not asdetainment.
(1st) Drakes — 3 strikes with 11 prowess; (2nd) Opponent may play as an automatic-attack any 1 Drake or Dragon hazard creature from his hand.

Stolen Knowledge. Place this card with a character in the company instead of discarding it; it may be stored at a Haven [H]; then all Dragon and Drake attacks are modified by -1 to prowess, body and strikes (minimum of 1).

card.name: The Prison's Spell is Fading
card.text: Unique. Durlach specific. You may start the game with this card in lieu of a minor item. Rotate this card by 90° each time The Black Enemy’s Wrath is played, or your mp total is greater than 9, 17, 25, 33 etc. Durlach may move with Under-deeps or region movement (overriding his card) based on the number of rotations, counting from The Under-forges or Eithel Morgoth: 1 rotation: 1 adjacent Under-deeps, no region; 2 rotations: 2 adjacent Under-deeps, 1 region; 3 rotations: 3 adjacent Under-deeps, 2 regions. etc. From 6 rotations: free Under-deeps movement; from 8 rotations: free region movement.

card.name: The Runeknife of Risinth
card.text: Unique. Rune item. Playable at any site in the Northern Waste by a character with Spirit Abuse, if the company has faced an attack by Spirits of Cold and Ice this turn. Discard (for no effect) a magic card from hand during the site phase to tap any character or ally with a body stat at the site and untap bearer. Bearer must make a CC as if the magic card were played. tap: after a successful strike from bearer in CvCC and remove a Tear of Yavanna borne by the defeated character from play.

card.name: The Sled-horde
card.text: Unique. Playable at Urdic Camp if the influence check is greater than 10. Standard Modifications: Hoarmûrath (+3), any other Man faction playable in the Northern Waste (-2). tap: allow any covert company travelling in the Northern Waste to move 1 additional region.

attr.value: Eithel Morgoth (0), Ancient Maze (6), The Iron-deeps (4), The Pits of Angband (7)

Only non-unique Orc and Troll characters may be brought into play at this site, unless the character has The Under-forges as its home site. Any gold ring stored at this site is automatically tested (modify the roll by -2). If 1 of your companies is at this site, all attacks against it are canceled.
Eithel Morgoth (0), Ancient Maze (6), The Iron-deeps (5), The Pits of Angband (7)

Any Drake may be played keyed to this site. Non-Nazgûl creatures played at this site attack normally, not as detainment.

Stolen Knowledge. When this card would be placed in yourdiscard pile, place it under the control of a character leaving thesite. This card can than be stored at a Haven [H] to give allSpawn and Fallen Maia attacks -1 prowess, -1 body and -1 strikes (to aminimum of 1).

(1st) Undead — 3 strikes with 12 prowess; each character wounded must make a CC; (2nd) Trap — each character faces a strike with 10 prowess —cannot be canceled and weapons do not modify—;(3rd) Opponent may play as an automatic-attack any 1 (non-spider) Spawn creature from his hand.
Any Spawn or Drake ally playable at any Under-deeps site is also playable at this site. Non-Nazgûl creatures played at this site attack normally.

card.name: The Wargs Wield the Goblins
card.text: Playable during CvCC, if all characters in the company control a wolf ally and no other non-flying allies are in the company. The attack by this company cannot be canceled. If the company is attacked, you may assign all strikes (regardless of your character’s status). Alternatively, this card may be played during the movement hazard phase if all characters in the company control a wolf ally: cancel a non-unique non-flying attack against the company.

attr.value: Traps — 2 strikes with 10 prowess —cannot be canceled and weapons do not modify—
Contains a hoard. *Only playable if the the company has either faced an attack keyed to this site, or discards (for no effect) a Lost Knowledge it controls.
(1st) Traps — 2 strikes with 10 prowess —cannot be canceled and weapons do not modify—(2nd) Opponent may play Elven Wards as asecond automatic-attack (which affects the site).
(1st) Undead — 3 strikes with 9 prowess;(2nd) Opponent may play as an automatic-attack 1 non- unique hazard creature from his hand normally keyed to Coastel Sea [c].
Contains a hoard. Hazard player may play any Dragon's Curse from hand (not counting against the hazard limit) on any characters entering the site.

An overt company must tap 2 untapped character (if available) if this site is revealed as its new site. Contains a hoard. Hazard player may play any Dragon's Curse from hand (not counting against the hazard limit) on any characters entering the site.
Spirits of Ice and Cold — 3 strikes with 8 prowess —treat as Undead—
Spirits of Ice and Cold — 3 strikes with 8 prowess —treat as Undead—

card.name: Torogcrist
card.text: Unique. Weapon. Axe. Two-handed. Playable at any Under-deeps Dark-hold [D]. Warrior only: +3 to prowess (to a maximum of 10; against a Troll strike: +5 to prowess to a maximum of 12 and -2 to strike’s body). tap: allow bearer to face a strike from a Troll attack another character in his company is facing.

card.name: True Spirits of the North Winds
card.graphics: True Spirits of the North Winds.jpg
card.text: Unique. Maia. 3 strikes. Attacker chooses defending characters. Detainment against a hero and covert companies. May be played keyed to any non-Shadow-land [s] (and non-Wilderness [w], if Doors of Night is in play) region in the Northern Waste. May always be played on a company in the Northern Waste containing Eloeklo. May also be played as a resource at any time to cancel an attack by Eloeklo or to cancel CvCC if Eloeklo is in the attacking company.

card.name: Uldor the Accursed
card.text: Unique. Undead. May be played at Himring. 1 strike. If Doors of Night is in play, may be played keyed to any non-Haven [H], non- Free-hold [F] site in East Bay of Forochel, Elven Shores, Gondalf, Minheldolath, Narthalf or West Bay of Forochel. Weapons do not modify, unless Elven Blade is played on the weapon.

card.name: Umli Traders
card.text: Unique. Playable at Vasaran Ahjo if the influence check is greater than 8. Standard Modifications: Dwarves (+1), Men (+1), Elves (-1). This faction is worth 2 mp if placed under Profitable Trade. May also be played as a minion resource by a covert company.

attr.value: Men — 2 srikes with 7 prowess (detainment against covert companies)
A ranger at this site may tap to searchyour playdeck (shuffle) or discard pile for Skis and Fur-coats and place it with his company.

card.name: Urdrak
card.text: Unique. Ice-orc. Discard on a body check of 8. +1 EI against Orcs with home site Kala Dulakurth.

card.name: Vanha
card.text: Unique. Spirit-namer. +2 EI against Men andUmli characters with a home site in the Northern Waste. Healing Song may be played on Vanha as if on an Elf. tap: if no other characters are in her company to prevent any hazard creature being played on her keyed to a region in the Northern Waste.

attr.value: Umlati (Dwarves/Men) — each character faces a strike with 7 prowess (detainment against covert company)
Umli Traders faction is playable atthis site.
Umli Traders faction is playable at this site.

card.name: Vision Path
card.text: Ritual. Elf only. Playable during the site phase on an Elf at the same site as Keeper of the Lodge. taTapp the Elf. All attempts to place target bearer in your hand are canceled. +1 to his CC. If this card is untapped, character cannot make influence, riddling, offering or flattery attempts.tap: during the site phase at a site where Information is playable. Once Vision Path is tapped it does not untap and dark enchantments cannot be played on bearer. Cannot be duplicated on a character.

card.name: War-wargs
card.text: Wolves. 2 strikes. As a creature, playable keyed to any Ruins & Lairs [R] with a Wolf automatic-attack. As a long-event, all Wolf attacks with body have their body modified by +1; and all Wolf attacks with no body have 4 body.

card.name: War-wolves
card.text: Wolves. 2 strikes. As a creature, playable keyed to any Ruins & Lairs [R] with a Wolf automatic-attack or any Shadow-hold [S] with an Orc automatic-attack. As a short-event, +2 to the prowess of an Orc creature attack keyed to a region by type or name.

card.name: Warrior-priests of Angmar
card.text: Unique. Playable at Litash and only by The Witch-king or The Angulion if the influence check is greater than 9.Standard Modifications: none tap: cancel a non-unique Man, Orc, or Troll creature attack without an asterix (*) keyed by name or type to Angmar or its adjacent regions against 1 of your companies.

card.name: Were-wolf
card.text: Demon. Wolf. 1 strike. May also be played at a Ruins & Lairs [R] that has at least 3 Wildernesses [w] in its site path. Any body check resulting from the attack is modified by +1, if the character is not bearing any armor, shield or helmet. Cannot be duplicated on a given turn.

card.name: Where the Wargs Howl
card.text: Playable on a company that has faced a Wolf attack this turn; does not count against the hazard limit. For the rest of the turn, any Orc hazard creature may be played on the company regardless of its site path or site.

card.name: White Vision
card.text: Disease. Playable on a company moving in the Northern Waste. Make a roll for every character in the company, modified by -3 if characters home site is in the Northern Waste, + 1 if Gates of Morning is in play, +2 if Sun is in play. If result is higher than the characters body he receives -2 prowess and cannot use warrior, scout or ranger skill cards. If more than half of the characters in the company are affected, the company may only move up to 3 regions. Discard a card with a healing effect from the company or your hand to cure 1 character in the company. Discard this card if the company leaves the Northern Waste. Cannot be duplicated on a given company.

card.name: White Wolves
card.text: Wolves. 4 strikes. May be played keyed to any non-Coastal Sea [c] region in the Northern Waste. If Doors of Night is in play, may be played keyed to any region in the Northern Waste. Additionally if Long Winter or Fell Winter is in play, may be played keyed to any region adjacent to the Northern Waste.

card.name: Wind-horde
card.text: Unique. Playable at any tapped or untapped non-Haven [H] site in the Northern Waste after the company plays a Conjure the Tempest with a result for Demon and if the influence check is greater than 8. Standard Modifications: A manifestation of Eloeklo, Lindor’s Bane is in the influencing characters company (+3).

card.name: Wolf-steed
card.text: Playable by an Orc at a Shadow-hold [S] or protected Wizardhaven [H]. tap: cancel a strike from a non-automatic- attack against bearer or itself. If the company constist of only Orcs and wolf allies, and each character controls a wolf ally, then all characters receive +1 prowess and the company may move 2 additional regions (to a maximum of 6) per turn.

card.name: Wose Shamanist Amulet
card.text: Playable only on a company containing a Wose character, or after successful play of a Wose faction or rune item. You may place a defeated non-asterix (*) Animal, Spider or Wolf creature with this item. tap: cancel an attack from the corresponding creature type. Only 1 creature may be placed with this item.

attr.value: Spirits of Ice and Cold — 3 strikes with 8 prowess —treat as Undead—
Spirits of Ice and Cold — 3 strikes with 8 prowess —treat as Undead—
